Top 10 Flutter App Development Tools That You Can’t Deny Using in 2021!

By Antino Labs July 22, 2021 4 Mins Read

Mobile apps are spreading their roots around the globe, and taking businesses on this digital platform has become an utmost task to compete in the growing digital market. To keep the businesses at pace, one of the most appealing and exceptional frameworks is Flutter. Flutter app development tools enable businesses to choose from various tools for developing an application. Each of these tools is promising for making coding agile and simpler for developers. Flutter tools are an unmatched companion in terms of code debugging, visual support, and code completion.

Top 10 Flutter App Development Tools

  • Panache
  • Codemagic
  • Adobe Plugins
  • RevenueCat
  • Supernova
  • Appetize
  • Sylph
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Square
  • WonderPush

Panache

One of the most trusted tools by the Flutter developers, Panache enables developers to make customized material themes for the Flutter applications. Besides, it provides the option to customize the shape, theme, color, and export it as the .dart file to the Google Drive folder. Panache is used by thousands of Flutter developers as it provides them an option to add a personalized touch to the application.

Codemagic

One of the most useful tools for the Flutter application development, Codemagic provides the ability to the developers to launch the application in the market without any sort of configuration. The automation feature offered by this tool, helps businesses create and test the application without any obstacles involved in between.

Adobe Plugins

It is a collaboration tool that helps in creating and sharing designs for apps, games, sites, voice interfaces, etc. Adobe’s Creative Cloud lets designers turn text, micro-interactions, vector art, animations, and images into captivating and fully functional prototypes. Adobe Plugins gels well with the current plugins, giving developers ample opportunity to try their hands in creating bewitching and captivating app solutions.

RevenueCat

An in-app management & subscription tool, RevenueCat gives back-up for Android, iOS, and Stripe. With RevenueCat, businesses can make and manage subscriptions & in-app subscriptions, handling the billing infrastructure and doing the heavy lifting. Further, RevenueCat also tracks the working of an application by evaluating MPR, churn, and LTV.

Supernova

Supernova assists businesses to develop UI code for Flutter. Using Supernova, businesses can run a Flutter application concurrently, and changes happen in real-time. This tool can save businesses’ time by importing their Adobe XD or Sketch file.

Appetize

An online-based excellent tool for Flutter app development, Appetize assists businesses to release their apps on the Android and iOS platforms promptly. The tool even helps run the native apps on smart devices if a user accesses the browser in JavaScript or HTML format. Furthermore, this tool is natural for developers and users to use their apps efficiently.

Sylph

Developed by Maurice McCabe, Sylph is an open-source command-line tool. Sylph is used largely in the Flutter community to cover around the AWS Device Farm and offers them an option to run end-to-end tests and integration of Flutter on various iOS and Android gadgets in real-time.

Visual Studio Code

Visual Studio Code is used by Flutter developers for debugging cloud, web apps, running tasks, and version control. Developed by Microsoft, this is an open-source & free code editor for Linus, Windows, and macOS. Visual Studio Code attributes smart code completion, syntax highlighting, debugging support, snippets, code refactoring, and embedded GIT. Visual Studio Code works flawlessly with C++ and Python and is user-friendly and productive.

Square

Square gives more reliable assistance in taking care of all sorts of payment processing technicalities for businesses. The tool can further be customized with an easy user interface if used in the Flutter SDK. This tool also gives an option to store cards and fast checkouts through online wallets seamlessly.

WonderPush

Widely used in the Flutter application development, WonderPush is one of the most beneficial tools that can be used for in-app messaging and push notification. WonderPush tool not only enhances the user engagement but also grants assistance incorporating features with segmentation and targeting, A/B testing, and geo-targeting within the cost-effective slab.

The development of mobile applications is a constant process. Even after passing the testing stage and is launched in the market, the application still encounters version updates. Application developers are required to understand the issue, the client’s needs, and the effectiveness of the tools they are using.
